players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other, especially since we lost a team member last night."
You: "Let's work together to eliminate any suspects and gather more information."

Charlie: "I think we should focus on gathering more information about each other and try to eliminate any potential threats to our team. Let's be open and honest during our discussions, but also keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior or inconsistencies."

Diana: "I think we should consider the possibility that one of us is the mafioso and try to gather more evidence to support our suspicions. Let's share any information we have and work together to eliminate any potential threats to our team."
You: "I will continue to keep a close eye on everyone's behavior and be prepared to eliminate any potential threats. Let's all work together to gather more information and uncover the mafioso."

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."

Diana: "I think we should consider the possibility that one of us is the mafioso and try to gather more evidence to support our suspicions. Let's share any information we have and work together to eliminate any potential threats to our team."
Alice: "I will continue to keep a close eye on everyone's behavior and be prepared to eliminate any potential threats. Let's all work together to gather more information and uncover the mafioso."

Alice was arrested
